anti_patterns: No generic Bootstrap grids for the invitation page
No flat digital look - use texture/grain

texture.noise_overlay: fixed inset-0 z-50 pointer-events-none opacity-[0.04] mix-blend-multiply bg-[url('https://grainy-gradients.vercel.app/noise.svg')]

invitation_page.container: max-w-md mx-auto min-h-screen bg-[#FAFAF9] shadow-2xl relative overflow-hidden
invitation_page.alignment: text-center for headings, left-align for details

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary/90 px-8 py-3 rounded-full font-sans tracking-wide transition-all duration-300 hover:shadow-lg hover:-translate-y-0.5
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-primary border border-primary/20 hover:bg-secondary px-8 py-3 rounded-full font-sans transition-all duration-300

cards.invitation: bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-sm border border-white/50 p-8 rounded-2xl shadow-sm
cards.admin: bg-white border border-border p-6 rounded-xl shadow-sm

inputs.default: bg-transparent border-b border-primary/30 focus:border-primary px-0 py-2 outline-none w-full font-serif text-lg placeholder:text-muted-foreground/50 transition-colors

invitation_page: Use 'Pinyon Script' or 'Great Vibes' for the couple's names in the Hero section.
Implement a 'Music Player' as a floating circular button (bottom-right) with a vinyl spin animation when playing.
The 'Countdown' should use a serif font for numbers and small sans-serif for labels (Days, Hours, etc.).
The 'Gallery' must use a masonry or 'Tetris' layout, avoiding uniform squares.
The 'RSVP' form should feel like a letter or card, not a generic form.
Use Indonesian language: 'Kepada Yth.', 'Buka Undangan', 'Akad Nikah', 'Resepsi', 'Turut Mengundang', 'Kirim Ucapan'.
admin_dashboard: Use Shadcn UI components for all interactive elements (Tables, Forms, Dialogs).
Sidebar should be clean with icons.
Dashboard overview should show cards for: Total Tamu, Hadir, Belum Respon, Ucapan Masuk.
Guest Management table needs columns for: Nama, No. WhatsApp, Status Kehadiran, Jumlah Tamu, Aksi (Edit/Delete).
Include a 'Copy Link' button for the invitation URL.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES: Do not use generic 'Inter' font for headings.
Do not use pure black (#000000); use Charcoal (#4A4A4A) or Dark Grey.
Ensure 3:1 contrast ratio for large text and 4.5:1 for body text.
Design mobile-first for the invitation page.
